name: Out Of Sync (ShalinLathigra)
description:
WASD or Arrow keys to move

Jump with Space

Open doors and pick up items with F

Change layers with Q and E

Play a dimension hopping robot as it brings a deteriorating reality back in sync.

Info:

This game was made as part of Mini Jam 73. The theme for the jam was "Power" and the limitation was "Only Five Colours". 

I decided to make my own assets for the first time for this game and I had a lot of fun making them, I hope you enjoy!

Credits:

Art and Programming all done by ShalinL,

PressStart 2P font by codeman38 (https://www.dafont.com/codeman38.d695)

Lens Collection sound by NenadSimic (https://opengameart.org/users/nenadsimic)

Background Track by skrjablin (https://opengameart.org/content/melodic-power-track-c64-style)

Jump sound by diklon (https://opengameart.org/users/dklon)
